messages: Everything we do at Akamai stems from the initial guidance and creativity of our founders Dr. Tom Leighton and Danny Lewin. In May, both will be inducted into the National Inventors Hall of Fame: http://akamai.me/2jWiIs9 Please join us in celebrating this honor by liking this post and check back in May for news from the induction ceremony. Akamai's CEO Tom Leighton and Türk Telekom CEO Tahsin Yılmaz, signed the partnership papers today!

The partnership will ensure a significant increase in speed and performance for broadband and mobile users in Turkey, particularly when accessing social media and popular online video sites. http://bit.ly/17Ztbsg Timeline Photos

We are excited to announce our new strategic partnership with Türk Telekom! 

"Our partnership with Türk Telekom is a great way for both companies to bring new, innovative services to market and assist companies doing business inside the country and within the region. Over the coming years, we look forward to innovate together with Türk Telekom on cloud and network optimization solutions," said Akamai CEO, Tom Leighton. November 11, 2013 - Türk Telekom and Akamai Partner to Build CDN and Accelerate Media

Black Friday tends to drive much higher peaks earlier in the day because of research activity for offline shopping in the morning hours. Last year on Black Friday we reached peak by 11:00 AM ET, and in 2010 we hit peak by 1:00 PM ET. Strong Start to Black Friday - The Akamai Blog
